to.uri: sql:SELECT device_type as column1, exam_method as column2, pre_exam_from_type as column3, exam_year as column4, exam_month_of_year as column5, COUNT(*)||'' as column6 FROM ( select CASE WHEN pre_exam_from_type = '0' THEN '门诊' WHEN pre_exam_from_type = '2' THEN '住院' END as pre_exam_from_type, actual_exam_place,device_type, CASE WHEN position('平扫' in exam_method) > 0 THEN '平扫' WHEN position('增强' in exam_method) > 0 THEN '增强' END as exam_method, to_char(exam_date, 'yyyy') as exam_year, to_char(exam_date, 'yyyy-MM') as exam_month, to_char(exam_date, 'MM')||'月' as exam_month_of_year, to_char(exam_date, 'hh24') as exam_hour_of_day from v_exam where device_type in ('CT','MR') and pre_exam_from_type in ('0','2') and (position('平扫' in exam_method) > 0 or position('增强' in exam_method) > 0) ) cb_view GROUP BY exam_year, exam_month_of_year,device_type,exam_method,pre_exam_from_type?dataSource=iiDS

sql:SELECT device_type as column1, exam_method as column2, pre_exam_from_type as column3, exam_year as column4, exam_month_of_year as column5, COUNT(*)||'' as column6 FROM ( select CASE WHEN his.pre_exam_from_type = '0' THEN '门诊' WHEN his.pre_exam_from_type = '2' THEN '住院' END as pre_exam_from_type, ris.actual_exam_place,ris.device_type, CASE WHEN position('CTA' in ris.exam_body_part) > 0 THEN 'CTA' WHEN position('MRA' in ris.exam_body_part) > 0 THEN 'MRA' END as exam_method, to_char(ris.exam_date, 'yyyy') as exam_year, to_char(ris.exam_date, 'yyyy-MM') as exam_month, to_char(ris.exam_date, 'MM')||'月' as exam_month_of_year, to_char(ris.exam_date, 'hh24') as exam_hour_of_day from ris_exam ris join his_exam his on ris.sheetid=his.sheetid where ris.device_type in ('CT','MR') and his.pre_exam_from_type in ('0','2') and (position('CTA' in ris.exam_body_part) > 0 or position('MRA' in ris.exam_body_part) > 0) ) cb_view GROUP BY exam_year, exam_month_of_year,device_type,exam_method,pre_exam_from_type?dataSource=iiDS
